displayName: ChainPatrol - Real Time Security protecting the OP Collective
bio: Chainpatrol protects the Optimism Collective by blocking online threats daily
contributionDescription:
With the high volume of threats targeting the OP Collective in 2022, ChainPatrol set out to reduce these threats and protect the Optimism community. 

ChainPatrol's solution tracks phishing threats and prevents Optimism users from having their wallets drained.

ChainPatrol started protection for the Optimism Collective in December 2022 and has since blocked 502 Online Threats in Total.

ChainPatrol turned on our auto-detection systems and began reporting malicious URLs to our Wallet Network to have threats blocked in minutes versus days. (Coverage to 30+Million Users of MetaMask, Coinbase Wallet, Phantom, and 20+ Wallets).

ChainPatrol also manages the tracking and full takedown process with domain hosting providers and social platforms;  X/Twitter, Discord, Telegram, YouTube and Reddit.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://app.chainpatrol.io/optimism","description":"Optimism Security Portal "},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/chainpatrol","description":"🤖 Bot which provides Discord servers with access to ChainPatrol security tools"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://chainpatrol.io/docs/introduction","description":"ChainPatrol Docs"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CEIEicqoicE","description":"ChainPatrol Demo Video"}]
impactDescription:
Early detection and fast response to online threats across leading Crypto Wallets protects the OP Collective and the wider crypto community from losing millions in digital asset value.

ChainPatrols Platform automates off-chain monitoring, saving the Trust & Safety, and Community moderators time with reporting, and takedown activities.

ChainPatrol is an added defence layer and takedown system mitigating the financial cost and impact of weekly wallet drainer and phishing attacks.

ChainPatrol data protects millions of users through leading crypto wallets. Visitors to the malicious site on both desktop and mobile devices will be shown a warning, within minutes of the threats detection.

ChainPatrol Public Security Portal and Discord Bot make it easy for community members to report threats

bio: Blue Norva is a gamefi project on the Optimism network.
contributionDescription:
Although only the first phase of BlueNorva has been released, we have successfully attracted a considerable number of players who have minted our NFTs and traded the project token. This has increased the volume of trades on the Optimism network, consequently generating more fees.

Our project has also attracted players who wish to participate in our game to the Optimism network, as we are exclusively native to this platform. This has served as a means of introducing the network to those who have never used it before.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"CONTRACT_ADDRESS","url":"https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0x2e1d6149dbeb8b4c4cd4f18e744568a2244f0332","description":"BlueNorva treasury wallet address"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://medium.com/@bluenorva/blue-norva-a-new-way-for-gamers-to-earn-b85f9ae7e0bf","description":"Medium article about the project and the value it creates for end users"}]
impactDescription:
As a GameFi project utilizing NFTs, we have successfully devised an engaging approach to introduce more individuals to the world of NFTs and staking. We have generated value in the area of entertainment, allowing players to earn while they unwind.

Additionally, we have introduced a considerable number of first-time NFT minters to the NFT space within the Optimism ecosystem, effectively introducing new users to Optimism and its innovations. These efforts have resulted in increased fees and trade volume for the network.

bio: Layer3 makes learning and exploring crypto fun, engaging, and rewarding.
contributionDescription:
Crypto has an education, user engagement, and retention problem. Layer3 is addressing this with immersive, informative Quests and Journeys anchored by on-chain actions.

We've onboarded a substantial user base to Optimism, Base, and Zora, educating them on key concepts such as security basics, switching networks, and revoking smart contract approvals, spanning DeFi, NFTs, and other emerging sectors.

Layer3 ensures smooth cross-chain transfers with our native Bridge.

We champion Web3 democracy by educating users on direct voting or delegating OP tokens. Layer3 has 5,600 delegations and 179,000 OP voting power.

In total, we've empowered over 284,000 users to complete more than 5.9 million on-chain transactions on Optimism, all at no cost to the user.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://layer3.xyz/search?chainIds=10&hideExpired=false","description":"Selection of Optimism Quests on Layer3"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://layer3.xyz/category/base","description":"Selection of Base Quests on Layer3"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://blog.spindl.xyz/p/follow-the-users","description":"Article by Spindl referencing our impact on Base"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://layer3.xyz/bridge","description":"Layer3 bridge "},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://layer3.xyz/quests/an-introduction-to-zora","description":"Zora Quest #1"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://layer3.xyz/quests/zora-x-uniswap","description":"Zora Quest #2"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://layer3.xyz/quests/a-beginners-guide-to-music-nfts","description":" Zora Quest #3"}]
impactDescription:
First, Layer3 brought users to Optimism through our native bridge, accounting for 89,000 bridging transactions to Optimism.

Then, we provided open and immersive education verified by on-chain actions. Layer3 Quests are responsible for diving 285,000 users to make 5.9 million on-chain transactions across over 40 unique dapps on Optimism.

Finally, we contributed to the OP superchain thesis by catalyzing 65,000 users to complete 364,000 transactions on Base. We celebrated the Zora OP Stack launch while encouraging artists to create their own collection, learn about music NFT and collect a Zorb in the process – driving 144,800 users to transact on Zora.

bio: Full-stack infrastructure solution for fast and reliable dApp development.
contributionDescription: Since integrating Optimism (14/7/2021), Tenderly has brought essential infrastructure and tools into both the OP ecosystem and the area of network portability, allowing teams to build instantly and move across Web3 with ease. Developers now simplify, automate, and speed up testing with CI/CD pipelines, end-to-end tests, and robust dApp staging environments synced with live data. They also simulate complex scenarios to ensure contracts and transactions execute as expected before deployment, and the observability solutions enable developers to set up custom alerts and automated responses for instant incident management. Finally, with API and SDK devs easily interact with and extend Tenderly functionalities, and access data in order to create workflows that work best for them.

bio: We are building consensus layer client Grandine and EIP-4844 ecosystem.
contributionDescription: Our mission is to build the fastest Ethereum consensus layer client and related ecosystem. The consensus layer performance is critical for growing Ethereum validator list and scaling features such as blob transactions that help to scale Optimism (and other L2s)! We have already open-sourced some parts such as the high-performance rust-kzg https://github.com/sifraitech/rust-kzg library for EIP-4844 and we are in progress open-sourcing the rest. The client is currently available as a binary release for evaluation, which is used by a couple of percent of the mainnet according to MigaLabs ( https://monitoreth.io/validators ).
contributionLinks: [{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://grandine.io","description":"Best way to learn about Grandine is to check the https://grandine.io website."},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/sifraitech/rust-kzg","description":"Rust-kzg is and EIP-4844 library."}]
impactDescription:
We have built a high-performance EIP-4844 library that works as a drop-in replacement for a reference c-kzg-4844 library. The performance comparison can be found here https://github.com/sifraitech/rust-kzg .

Our main product Ethereum consensus layer client Grandine has the fastest state transition function. Our goal is to push the consensus layer performance further.
fundingSources: [{"type":"RETROPGF_2","currency":"OP","amount":2115,"description":"We received a 2115 OP reward for our work on rust-kzg."}]

bio: We are Bankless the first subDAO in Spanish from BanklessDAO

hiho, we are helping people understand the values of Optimism, we are very active creating content, memes, or own threads, publications and communication within the Telegram, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, Substack, Discord.
Also we have presence within the Governance forum with DAOstewards delegation from BanklessDAO and also we discuss the proposal and how we can work. We have a DeWork where we share everything that we are doing to make our Bankless community a more Optimistic one.  
We have four different Newsletter: 
1.- GM;NB a little abstract for our content 
2.- Nacion Bankless: Translation, original content, chilling.
3.- Diario Nacion Bankless: Bankless News, with a full focus on Latam impact
4.- Guías Bankless: Here we publish our own content and publications abour the protocols.

impactDescription:
I think that our job it's a s simple as our mission: To onboard the next billion people to the ecosystem, actually we are chain agnostic and we see the near future of adopting crypto as a very difficult point, but as the ecosystem grows and Optimism continues giving all the tools and code of conduct for the adoption its easier to us to just communicate. 
How we make this possible?
1.- Newsletter that let the people know what's happening in crypto and how we can became smarter and committed with the Optimism collective values. 
2.- Podcast and Videos: We interview the builders, and know how do they feel, we record our community calls that are free to everyone in the internet to learn more than just the theory.
3.- Real Life events: We are going to fund projects and people with knowledge

bio: Open and transparent DeFi analytics.
contributionDescription:
- Supported Optimism from day 1, being one of the first (if not first) data platform to track it
- Collected data for Optimism's DeFi projects, which was used by the Optimism Foundation to distribute grants and by Optimism's users to track projects on Optimism
- Launched LlamaZip, a router optimized for Optimism that saved Optimism's users lots of fees
- Launched LlamaSwap, which has routed >734M volume on Optimism and Base (13.3bn volume across all chains)
- Launched LlamaSearch, helping users avoid getting their wallet drained on phishing sites
- Launched LlamaPay on Optimism, used by some projects to pay salaries, vest tokens or simply distribute tokens.
- We maintain a list of free APIs, including our prices API, which are used by many projects on Optimism on their app/infrastructure
contributionLinks: [{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/defillama","description":"DefiLlama org with most of our projects"},{"type":"CONTRACT_ADDRESS","url":"https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0x6f9d14cf4a06dd9c70766bd161cf8d4387683e1b","description":"LlamaZip"},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/LlamaSwap","description":"LlamaSwap repos"},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/LlamaPay","description":"LlamaPay repos"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/llamasearch/iophmfgnjmfjdkodekdffgckoloooaci","description":"LlamaSearch"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/defillama/phgiabfbjodhgckcffppiboooeiecgeg","description":"DefiLlama extension"}]
impactDescription:
- Helped optimism gov decide on what grants to give and track ecosystem and impact of grants.
- 1M monthly users use us to discover protocols on Optimism (and other chains), track yields on Optimism, evaluate protocols, track chain metrics...
- LlamaSwap has routed >734M of volume on Optimism (672M) and Base (62M)
- LlamaZip has done >70k transactions, reducing costs for optimism's users
- Projects on optimism/base that use our APIs (mainly price api): pancakeswap, granary, mean finance, qidao, gamma, baseswap, ankr, revert finance... This infra that we maintain allows them to deliver their products/protocols to optimism users
- LlamaPay on Optimism has been used by Premia, PoolTogether, Velodrome... for their operations
- Over 10k daily users on our extension

bio: Simplifying the voting RetroPGF experience: easier to face 2 than 2000
contributionDescription:
Pairwise simplifies complex decision-making by presenting only two projects at a time for list creation. This method eases voting and introduces a system where citizens can project lists with budget allocations. Offering a solution to the RetroPGF 2 challenge of assigning percentages to 196 projects for example, Pairwise divides and reduces workload by categorizing projects and emphasizing individual expertise so that citizens can focus their vote on their areas of knowledge, ensuring both simplified and informed voting. The algorithm mirrors the Elo system used in games like League of Legends, where project comparison leads to more precise decisions.

We've crafted a completely new game experience for citizens, and we're eager for citizens to explore it.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/GeneralMagicio/pw-frontend","description":"Optimism game UI with Rainbow Kit wallet connect."},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/GeneralMagicio/pw-backend","description":"Backend for Optimism game: collations & algorithm."},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/GeneralMagicio/pw-retropgf3-categorize","description":"AI-driven API for project categorization in Optimism game."},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://pairwise.retropgf.com/","description":"Witness innovative list creation & reshaping of community decisions."}]
impactDescription: Pairwise was developed to enhance the RetroPGF decision-making process. Optimism currently has the power to use it when RetroPGF final data is made available. With streamlined choices, members can engage with projects more intuitively and suited to their knowledge, ensuring better decisions. The dynamic unlocking feature keeps the process engaging, allowing greater influence over time. Strategic allocation ensures votes align with individual visions. Beyond just vote simplification, Pairwise amplifies badgeholders' voices, championing true digital democracy. Focused on strengthening Optimism’s ecosystem, Pairwise stands as a pivotal tool, enabling badgeholders to efficiently contribute their expertise, maximizing impact with minimal time and creating a realm where every insight is valued.

bio: Ask me anything about Optimism Governance (trained on gov forums only)
contributionDescription:
We developed Optimism AI Chatbot that will provide up-to-date information, potentially saving each Optimism member or community at least one hour daily. 

Every day, platforms like Discourse and Discord are inundated with new inquiries. Many newcomers hesitate to ask questions, fearing they might appear uninformed. Simultaneously, even long-standing members often struggle to locate specific information. To address these challenges, we developed a chatbot to enhance the user experience for both new and seasoned Optimism members.

Note: This is v1, and we aim to improve the intelligence by at least 100x over next few months.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/RobinNagpal","description":"dodao-ui is the repository which has the code for the chatbot ui"}]
impactDescription:
he chatbot aims to save each member at least one hour every day. Assuming 50 full-time contributors and an average hourly rate of $50, this translates to a monthly productivity gain or cost savings of $75,000/month.

This is v1 to demonstrate feasibility. Future versions will be much more intelligent.

bio: Build, maintain, and grow true DAOs effortlessly. Innovate without limits!
contributionDescription:
We are seeking funding to support three groundbreaking components that have revolutionized the decentralized space:

Organizations Contracts: Realize decentralized organizations with ultimate power in the hands of token holders, thanks to Optimism's cost-efficient governance infrastructure.

Colonies Contracts: Bridge Ethereum and Optimism for seamless multi-chain operations, enabling funds to flow effortlessly between platforms.

Covenants Farming Contracts: Optimize Uniswap v2 and v3 farming on Optimism, incentivizing liquidity providers and utilizing v3's unique features.

Our crowning achievement is our commitment to accessibility. Any individual can deploy these contracts using our factory system, armed with nothing more than a browser and devoid of intricate coding tools.
impactDescription:
Organizations Contracts: We've launched decentralized DAOs on Optimism, empowering token holders and enhancing decentralized autonomy. Using Optimism's L2 scaling, we've led cost-effective governance innovations, enriching the Collective and reinforcing Ethereum's core values.

Colonies Contracts: Our efforts in linking Ethereum and Optimism through cross chain business models.

Covenants Farming Contracts: Our farming contracts for Uniswap v2 and v3 on Optimism allow for rapid bootstrapping of liquidity in the Collective. 

Our primary achievement is democratizing access. We've enabled the Collective to easily deploy contracts, merging advanced solutions with user accessibility. The Optimism Collective is now a symbol of innovation and inclusivity.

bio: Optimeme  creates and promote optimism and superchain related memes.
contributionDescription:
Optimeme was created to spread positivity, optimism, and foster a sense of community through the creative and engaging medium of memes. We firmly believe in the power of humor and relatability and it use case in onboarding more users to the optimism ecosystem.

1. Meme Creation:  We curate a diverse range of memes that are both humorous and educative. Our team of creative minds work to craft content that resonates with a broad audience of optimism ecosystem. 

2. Meme Promotion: Our team employs strategic and ethical methods to share these memes across various social media platforms and communities.

3. Superchain-Related Memes:  In addition to spreading optimism, we also have a special focus on optimism "superchain" related content.
impactDescription:
Through our relentless dedication to creating and promoting optimism and superchain-related memes, we've had a significant impact on both individuals and the broader online community.

On the superchain front, our mission is to educate and inspire people about the immense potential of blockchain technology. We've seen a growing interest and awareness in the transformative power of superchains, as our meme content has helped demystify complex concepts and made them more accessible to a wider audience.

Our impact can be measured in engagement metrics, as well. Our memes have reached vast audience   across various social media platforms, sparking discussions, sharing knowledge, and creating a sense of community among those interested in both optimism and blockchain technology.

bio: Revoke.cash is a token approvals dashboard and browser extension to stay safe.
contributionDescription:
Revoke.cash provides crypto users with security services. 

The main service is a token approvals dashboard that works with 60+ networks. The second service is a browser extension that warns users when they are about to perform potentially harmful actions, such as token approvals or NFT listings. This extension works with every EVM network out of the box.

We also provide educational content, both on Twitter and on our new knowledgebase section.

This year we created a number of important new features. One big feature is the "exploit checker" to quickly see if they are vulnerable to exploits like the big SushiSwap exploit in April this year or the recent Galxe hack. 

Other features include invalidating offchain signatures, "wallet health" metrics, support for 20+ new networks and more.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/RevokeCash/revoke.cash","description":"This contains all the code for the open source token approvals dashboard."},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/RevokeCash/browser-extension","description":"This contains all the code for the open source browser extension."}]
impactDescription:
End users in the Optimism Collective and larger crypto ecosystem can use the Revoke.cash token approvals dashboard and browser extension, and consume our educational content. By doing so they can protect themselves from hack and scams. And by using our new exploit checker tool they can check if they are already affected by such exploits, and recover control over their wallet.

This directly benefits end users in the Collective by saving them money that they might have lost to exploits. It also indirectly benefits companies and projects building in the Collective by providing infrastructure that gives their users more confidence and peace of mind when using decentralised applications.

The dynamic unlocking feature keeps the process engaging, allowing greater influence over time. Strategic allocation ensures votes align with individual visions. Beyond just vote simplification, Pairwise amplifies badgeholders' voices, championing true digital democracy. Focused on strengthening Optimism’s ecosystem, Pairwise stands as a pivotal tool, enabling badgeholders to efficiently contribute their expertise, maximizing impact with minimal time and creating a realm where every insight is valued.

bio: Simplifying the voting RetroPGF experience: easier to face 2 than 2000
contributionDescription:
Pairwise simplifies complex decision-making by presenting only two projects at a time for list creation. This method eases voting and introduces a system where citizens can project lists with budget allocations. Offering a solution to the RetroPGF 2 challenge of assigning percentages to 196 projects for example, Pairwise divides and reduces workload by categorizing projects and emphasizing individual expertise so that citizens can focus their vote on their areas of knowledge, ensuring both simplified and informed voting. The algorithm mirrors the Elo system used in games like League of Legends, where project comparison leads to more precise decisions.

We've crafted a completely new game experience for citizens, and we're eager for citizens to explore it.

bio: Ethers.js is a simple, compact and complete library for everything Ethereum.
contributionDescription:
Ethers.js is currently the most popular JavaScript library for Ethereum (and ilk) with over 1 million weekly npm installs (over 110 million, all time)  and is in the top 500 NPM packages by dependents.

Ethers has worked closely with the OP team to collaborate on the custom OP extension package as well as integrate new plug-ins for tuning network performance (such as custom priority fees), which are all built-in and automatically used for OP-detected networks.

Ethers is also used by many of the other tools and projects which help enable Optimism, such as MetaMask, Uniswap and Hardhat.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/ethers-io/ethers.js","description":"The Ethers.js project repository."},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://ethers.org","description":"The Ethers.js project website."},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://docs.ethers.org","description":"The Ethers.js documentation."}]
impactDescription:
The impact provided by Ethers has been a simple and popular developer library.

Many aspects of Ethers favour simplicity and safety-by-default, such as "garbage-in, fail loud" (opposed to "garbage-in, garbage-out", which often results in unsafe or error prone behaviour) which has helped protect developers and end-users from innocent mistakes, which could be costly or dangerous in the the blockchain world. Making it difficult to build a foot-gun is a feature.

By being so widely used, it has also led to the development of many other projects on top of it, further expanding the ecosystem.

bio: Proof of Personhood from your government ID
contributionDescription:
Proof of Personhood is one way to enable democratic systems on chain that distribute voting power to each person instead of based on the size of the wallet. Coinpassport makes it easy to provide a strong signal to your individual humanity by linking your passport to your Ethereum wallet. For a fee of 3 USDC, Coinpassport uses Stripe Identity to verify your face matches your passport.

Coinpassport has been live on Optimism mainnet since May 14, 2022 and has received 22 fee payments in that time.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"CONTRACT_ADDRESS","url":"https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0x247baae25D0c32fdA5CfB902c0d87D47587CF9Da","description":"Coinpassport Verifications contract on Optimism"},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/coinpassport","description":"Coinpassport organization on Github (frontend and contracts)"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://github.com/gitcoinco/passport/pull/1063","description":"PR for Integration with Gitcoin Passport"}]
impactDescription:
Anyone can build applications that use verified passports using Coinpassport.

I made a no-code DAO construction dAPP (https://democratic.capital/) which requires all users to have verified using Coinpassport in order to make groups, launch tokens, create elections, and custom liquidity pools.

I've also created a pull request for Gitcoin Passport to add a Coinpassport stamp so that users can onboard faster and easier by producing a stamp that would cost a lot to forge. I have not been able to make contact with anyone at Gitcoin about receiving feedback on this integration.

bio: Socket is an interoperability bringing seamless connectivity to blockchains.
contributionDescription:
Socket is an interoperability protocol that powers seamless asset & data transfers for apps across blockchains. 70+ wallets & apps including Metamask, Coinbase Wallet, Bungee, Synthetix, Polynomial, Kwenta, Lyra, Rainbow & Zerion leverage Socket for various cross-chain use cases.
Here are our contributions to Optimism:

- Enabled onboarding to Optimism right within 30+ wallets, not just from Mainnet but 10+ chains.
- Improved cross-chain UX for 10+ Optimism native apps including top options and perp protocols with our open-source 'Socket Plugin'
- Refuel, our public good to Optimism enables users to receive gas tokens, with no extra fees
- Day 0 bridging support across our 100+ ecosystem for OP-Stack chains like Base, Zora, etc.
- Built OP-Stack with Aevo to bring zero-cost L2<>L2 bridging
contributionLinks: [{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://x.com/MetaMask/status/1699770227343401092?s=20","description":"Bringing bridging to Optimism to millions of wallet users of Metamask"},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/SocketDotTech/plugin","description":"Open-Source bridge widget for developers, used across Synthetix ecosystem"},{"type":"CONTRACT_ADDRESS","url":"https://optimistic.etherscan.io/address/0x5800249621DA520aDFdCa16da20d8A5Fc0f814d8","description":"Refuel - public good for free gas top-ups to new users on Optimism"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://mirror.xyz/0x6FD2bd90D50eDEe139103454116F252f6F5eC928/s602ukNdxwBkr9imWWO2MBgzpNny0O1ews_Nev75ppM","description":"SuperBridge for OP-Stack, launching with Aevo"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://x.com/SocketDotTech/status/1629121374387339264?s=20","description":"Day 0 bridging support to Base across 100+ Socket Apps"}]
impactDescription:
Over the last 2 years, Socket has worked to eliminate one of the biggest problems hindering user onboarding and protocol adoption on Optimism. Along with our 100+ ecosystem, we powered seamless cross-chain experiences right within apps, removing any friction to try Optimism.
Here is our impact so far:
- Bridged $1B+ volume in 2 years across Metamask, Zapper, Zerion, Slingshot, Bungee, Layer3 & 30+ apps
- Onboarded 1.5M+ wallets with a simplified 1-click onboarding into Optimism on top OP native apps including Synthetix, Kwenta, Lyra & Polynomial
- Facilitated 600K+ gas top-ups to Optimism via our public good Refuel
- Facilitated 125K+ transfers to Base & Zora supercharging OP-Stack growth
- SuperBridge to Aevo facilitated 10K+ zero-cost transfers, pushing one step closer to Superchain

bio: flink is a Reddit-like Farcaster interface to see hot & trending conversations
contributionDescription:
flink is a consumer app / interface for Farcaster, which has identity ownership stored on-chain on OP mainnet. flink has been responsible for onboarding the majority of Farcaster uses by a wide margin since Farcaster moved to permissionless signups. This has in turn generated revenue for the protocol, all while being a self-funded side project.

flink is differentiated from other clients by providing value to the existing web3 userbase. flink allows for anyone to simply connect a wallet and onboard to Farcaster by registering on OP mainnet. flink also provides rich embeds for users to transact (such as mint NFTs) through flink across a number of chains with the users sharing the links earning referral rewards through supported platforms like Zora and mint.fun.
impactDescription: flink has been built with a focus on crypto-native consumers, many of which have already been a part of the Collective. Therefore, the main contribution is allowing these members to be able to permissionlessly onboard to Farcaster and participate in discussions through a client that is more familiar to their day-to-day web3 experiences. flink also allows for those who onboard to have a richer social experience by providing transaction embeds directly within the client experience for discovery and minting on shared NFTs.

bio: OurNetwork is the leading crypto analytics newsletter and community.
contributionDescription:
OurNetwork is a free crypto analytics newsletter and community of more than 300 analysts and 29,000 readers from around the world. Published by Spencer Noon (that’s me 👋) and produced by our analyst community, the newsletter provides weekly data-driven insights and analysis on the top projects in crypto, including Optimism and the OP ecosystem.

bio: The home for web3 publishing.
contributionDescription: Since Mirror launched Writing NFTs on Optimism Network as a default, we've contributed to the growth of the Optimism Network by being an app where other projects can share their ideas via Optimism NFTs. Early on we knew that for "collect" to be the new "like" users would need to find inexpensive and quick options for minting NFTs. That's where Optimism came in as an obvious choice, and we've since been one of Optimism's partners in bringing a more mainstream use case to the rollup.
impactDescription: Over 1 million Writing NFTs have been minted on Mirror using Optimistic Ethereum. That's more than any other network we support as Optimism is the default network in our settings. We have helped more people bridge to Optimism through our UX and encouraging users to collect entries.

bio: Simplifying the voting RetroPGF experience: easier to face 2 than 2000
contributionDescription:
Pairwise simplifies complex decision-making by presenting only two projects at a time for list creation. This method eases voting and introduces a system where citizens can project lists with budget allocations. Offering a solution to the RetroPGF 2 challenge of assigning percentages to 196 projects for example, Pairwise divides and reduces workload by categorizing projects and emphasizing individual expertise so that citizens can focus their vote on their areas of knowledge, ensuring both simplified and informed voting. The algorithm mirrors the Elo system used in games like League of Legends, where project comparison leads to more precise decisions.

We've crafted a completely new game experience for citizens, and we're eager for citizens to explore it.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/GeneralMagicio/pw-frontend","description":"Optimism game UI with Rainbow Kit wallet connect."},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/GeneralMagicio/pw-backend","description":"Backend for Optimism game: collations & algorithm."},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/GeneralMagicio/pw-retropgf3-categorize","description":"AI-driven API for project categorization in Optimism game."},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://pairwise.retropgf.com/","description":"Witness innovative list creation & reshaping of community decisions."}]
impactDescription: Pairwise was developed to enhance the RetroPGF decision-making process. Optimism currently has the power to use it when RetroPGF final data is made available. With streamlined choices, members can engage with projects more intuitively and suited to their knowledge, ensuring better decisions. The dynamic unlocking feature keeps the process engaging, allowing greater influence over time. Strategic allocation ensures votes align with individual visions. Beyond just vote simplification, Pairwise amplifies badgeholders' voices, championing true digital democracy. Focused on strengthening Optimism’s ecosystem, Pairwise stands as a pivotal tool, enabling badgeholders to efficiently contribute their expertise, maximizing impact with minimal time and creating a realm where every insight is valued.

bio: Fullstack engineer and data analyst. Maxi on Web3 and Public Goods.
contributionDescription:
As an enthusiastic supporter of the OP Stack and the Optimism Collective my contributions over the past months have been the following: 
(1) Created a Dune dashboard on Gitcoin Passport and the Ethereum Attestation Service (EAS) in Optimism. 
(2) Created a Dune dashboard about the contribution of SushiSwap to the growth of the Optimism user base.
(3) Created a Dune dashboard on Iron Bank Liquidity Mining in Optimism.
(4) Developed Influenpeer which is a platform to create video NFTs up to 10 GB  and enable the generation of onchain rewards in the Superchain.
(5) Developed GenNFT Forge to create generative AI NFTs and enable the generation of onchain rewards in the Superchain.

impactDescription:
The Dune dashboards that I created about Gitcoin Passport, EAS, SushiSwap, and Iron Bank in Optimism helped analysts, developers and other stakeholders in the Collective to identify areas for product growth and track the performance.

On the other hand, Influenpeer enabled the creation of video NFTs up to 10 GB with video playback optimised for all the bandwidths with Livepeer on top of onchain rewards. Creators and their audience in the OP stack were able to build a rich creator economy in the Superchain. Influenpeer also welcomed other developers to build a similar experience and extend it with other features and plugins.

GenNFT Forge empowered consumers and the university student community to create and sell easily generative NFTs driving demand to onchain rewards in the Superchain.

bio: My creations merge digital and physical, embodying significant blockchain events
contributionDescription:
I am Xofee, a mechanical artist, creating marvels like the 'Opti Maze,' 'KZG Marble Machine,' and 'Onchain Illusion,' each narrating significant blockchain milestones. 
My project, the 'KZG Marble Machine,' was crafted for the KZG ceremony, a pivotal moment in enhancing Layer 2 capacities on Ethereum. It encapsulated the blockchain's essence, creating a useful spectacle appreciated and featured in notable podcasts like Bankless' Weekly Rollup’ and the Daily Gwei.
'Opti Maze' was a tribute to Optimism on OPcraft. 'Onchain Illusion,' created for the Onchain Summer event, symbolizes the amalgamation of art and blockchain.
Through the RetroPGF 3 initiative, I seek to secure support that will further fuel my quest to blend the abstract blockchain concepts with tangible mechanical artistry.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://medium.com/@Xofee3/the-kzg-marble-machine-my-special-contribution-to-ethereums-kzg-ceremony-d137313443a1","description":"The KZG Marble Machine is a mechanical art piece which generates randomness"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://prop.house/proposal/6601","description":" Onchain Illusion designed for the Onchain Summer event"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://x.com/Xofee3/status/1586022062245613568?s=20","description":"Opti Maze is an inventive maze crafted in honor of Optimism on OPcraft"}]
impactDescription: My contributions, notably through the 'KZG Marble Machine', 'Opti Maze', and 'Onchain Illusion', have visually encapsulated pivotal blockchain moments, fostering a deeper appreciation for the technology among the Optimism Collective. By blending the physical with the digital, my creations have offered a tangible narrative, enriching the community's engagement with Optimism's progressive journey, and highlighting the boundless creative potential within the blockchain domain. I distribute all 3D printing files and my programs as open source.

bio: Homepage and toolkit for your onchain community
contributionDescription:
Since integrating Optimism to Guild - supporting tokens, NFTs, contract queries and OP Attestations - our contributions have expanded by introducing wallet-based actions as requirements and gated NFT distribution on Optimism.

Wallet Activity requirements allows communities to create unique membership journeys for developers, high-volume traders and power users based on their onchain actions and interest, while protecting shared spaces from Sybils within the Optimism ecosystem.

We also have rolled out our native NFT distribution tool on Optimism recently. Guild’s native NFT reward and composable role structure enable builders to have greater control over the allocation and utilization of their assets within the community, while linking immediate value to them.
impactDescription:
By building a permissionless homepage and toolkit for onchain communities, we continuously prioritize user experience and seamless onboarding for both builders and members.

With expanding the support for Wallet Activity requirements and NFT rewards on Optimism, communities can run NFT-based campaigns and build future strategies for growth and engagement natively in the ecosystem. Allowing users to perform transactions, increasing network usage and ecosystem growth.

Guild currently has over 400 communities leveraging Optimism integrations, with 430K+ members who hold roles with OP-based requirements. Notable communities include Stargate Finance (242K holders), Linea (122K holders) and Base (58K holders).

bio: Blockchain forensics, investigations, and whistleblower
contributionDescription: I provide full scale investigations to projects and individuals who have fallen to phishing, hacks, exploits, and other scams. My work has lead to multiple arrests, legal action, and asset recovery for victims. In the past I have offered these services free of charge. I also educate newcomers in the space so they can understand some of the warning signs bad actors can show.
impactDescription:
1) Pika had a security incident on 5-30-23 after a Discord server was compromised resulting in $330K+ lost. Orbiter suffered a similar incident on 5-31-23 resulting in $760K+ lost. 7-17-23 I shared findings on scammer I traced it back to. I privately shared more details with both so they could take legal action against the individual.
2) Recently there were SIM swap targeting FriendTech users. I traced multiple thefts & froze funds at a CEX for KingMgugga & Gr0wCrypt0
3) Discovered Magnate on Base would likely rug after the deployers address was funded from previous scam. I put out a warning so investors could save funds. Shortly after it rugged
4) Made posts in my Telegram encouraging people to participate in Gitcoin & apply to RPGF round 3
5) Found the person who rug pulled BALD on Base

impactDescription: We've published 32 on-chain articles in our Crypto Basics Series, demystifying layer 2 complexities, leading to informed choices for projects building on Optimism. By minting NFTs of this series on Optimism, we’ve demonstrated OP's scalability and utility, enticing developers and users alike. Our outreach has extended to a global scale with over 3 million reads (on all our BP content) across 168 countries, boosting Optimism's brand recognition and usage worldwide. The hOPe Series, available as free mints on Optimism, has enriched our community’s understanding of the ecosystem’s nuances, accelerating its adoption. Optimism-focused newsletters further supported this objective. Beneficiaries range from novice users to developers and orgs contemplating L2 solutions.

bio: Public Nouns funds experiments in the public goods space.
contributionDescription:
Public Nouns is funding experiments in the Public Goods space and creating value.  Optimism was included from the start to be an important part of this mission.

Public Nouns (https://publicnouns.wtf/) exists to promote, fund, and proliferate aligned projects that focus on serving our public.

Public Nouns launched at the end of Sep 2022, and has raised over 200 ETH in donations via auctions of Public Nouns.

Along with some other Public Goods aligned entities in the space, Optimism was brought in as a founding Public Nouns organization!  Optimism Public Nouns have one of three amazing OPossum heads.

If you are interested in Public Goods and you are also an Optimism fan, the Public Nouns community is for you!  Maybe it’ll even have a OPossum head!
impactDescription:
Public Nouns expanded awareness of both Optimism and Public Goods via leveraging the very popular Nouns DAO mechanism and helped linked OP to PG forever.   

Along with some other Public Goods aligned entities in the space, Optimism was brought in as a founding Public Nouns organization!  Optimism Public Nouns have one of three amazing OPossum heads.  

The OPossum headed Public Nouns are a representation of this!

bio: A coder with a difference
contributionDescription:
And we were going to build it. We needed a team.

So, we raised our first $3.5M from Paradigm shortly after releasing Unipig–the first ever rollup PoC, a collaboration with Uniswap–at Devcon V.

Ultimately, it’s taken years for the scalability endgame to come into clear view. But, to this day, the designs sit at the heart of Ethereum’s pragmatic, rollup-centric roadmap.

bio: A reputation system using NFT badges to represent Web3 achievements.
contributionDescription:
EtherScore is a reputation system that uses NFTs to represent Web3 achievements. The system provides badges based on user interactions such as voting in DAOs, swapping or lending coins/NFTs, etc. Users can collect badges to improve their on-chain reputation and build their EtherScore profile. On top of this, Dapps can develop services that require a reputation system, such as curated social networks, fair airdrops/ICOs, DeFi, DAO governance etc. Chainlink and The Graph are used for decentralization and verifiability of our solution.

The alpha version of EtherScore is live on Mumbai testnet and offers more than 80 badges for users of the most popular Dapps and chains. Of these 80 badges, 13 are related to the Optimism ecosystem, cumulating to 120,000 mints (details in the Impact section).
impactDescription:
Out of our total badges, 16% are related to the OP Stack, accounting for 18% of the 687k minted badges.

User Onboarding and Education: We've incentivized and facilitated new user adoption, promoting actions like utilizing the official bridge and participating in DAO governance.

User Experience: EtherScore simplifies on-chain activity summaries, enhancing the user experience and making it easier for users to monitor their achievements within the Optimism ecosystem.

Sybil Resistance Tool: Our tool has applications such as reputation-based governance and fair reward distribution, promoting inclusivity and fairness.

In addition, our EtherScore badge collection recognizes and rewards user contributions within the Optimism ecosystem (details of badges with their stats in spreadsheet).

bio: An open-source, framework-agnostic JavaScript library to onboard users to web3.
contributionDescription:
Web3 Onboard is Blocknative’s answer to delivering the best experience for developers and end users as they connect and engage across blockchains. Launched in 2019, it is the easiest way to add multi-wallet, multi-chain support to any project. With built-in modules for over 80 unique hardware, software, and browser wallets, Web3 Onboard saves time related to the UI and logic of connecting wallets to dapps throughout the EVM.  

Web3 Onboard is open-source, framework-agnostic JavaScript library accessible on Github. Developers can seamlessly connect users’ wallets to dapps, track wallet states, and match the UI of specific dapps. Transaction preview, an integrated feature, previews unsigned Ethereum transactions, which can help with testing and debugging transactions committed on-chain.

impactDescription:
Web3 Onboard, one of the oldest and best maintained open source libraries, has wide adoption with 500,000+ user wallets connected, 130+ contributors, and 300+ community PRs. Web3 Onboard is used by Curve, Zapper, Compound, Iron Vank, Valk, Synthetix, Beefy, and many others. With native Optimism support added in 2022, users of 80+ wallets can transition effortlessly to and from Optimism when transacting on the most popular dapps in the ecosystem. 

Web3 Onboard ensures users have an intuitive, multi-wallet, multi-chain option for connecting to their any dapps from any wallet. We want all end users to feel comfortable playing games, interacting with defi, and connecting wallets. Optimism is natively integrated so any of the 500,000+ connected user wallets can switch to Optimism with a click.

bio: Support Optimism developers & users in South Korea
contributionDescription:
At Optimism Korea, our primary focus is breaking language barriers and cultivating the Korean Optimism builder community.

Translation: Language remains a formidable challenge for non-English-speaking builders. We're addressing this by translating all developer documentation and Mirror on Optimism's blogs into Korean. This initiative empowers developers and users to grasp Optimism's vision and actively contribute.

Builder Community: We've initiated the formation of an Optimism builder community, starting with our team of 8 experienced Optimism developers. Additionally, we plan to organize Developer Meetups to welcome newcomers.

Our contributions are geared towards empowering and expanding Optimism's presence in the Web3 ecosystem while bridging language gaps.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://optimism-korea.oopy.io/","description":"Optimism Korea website with all key contents translated into Korean!"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://mirror.xyz/0x512cEb57C6BCf86757C2693e729cBEE0AEa7Ffde","description":"Mirror blog where recent articles are translated into Korean!"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://twitter.com/optimism_korea","description":"Official Twitter for Optimism Korea - stay updated with all the latest news!"}]
impactDescription:

bio: Airstack: The easiest way to integrate everything web3
contributionDescription:
Airstack provides AI-powered APIs for searching across blockchains, dapps, and protocols and easily integrating into any application. 

Airstack is rapidly becoming go-to middleware for web3 ecosystems such as XMTP, Lens, Farcaster, 6551, POAPs, NFTs, and Mar-Tech. The company's AI-powered APIs uniquely enable devs to integrate cross-chain, cross-dapp, cross-protocol -- enabling composability and saving devs months of work and costs. Before Airstack devs would have to learn each protocol and keep up with their contracts, reorgs, versions and build backends to ingest their data; with Airstack they literally just plug-and-play APIs and keep moving. 

In Q3 2023 Airstack extended its capabilities to Farcaster/Optimism and Base blockchains.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://app.airstack.xyz","description":"Airstack AI Search & APIs"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://docs.airstack.xyz/airstack-docs-and-faqs/guides/farcaster/resolve-farcaster-users","description":"Get onchain data for all Farcaster users on Optimism"}]
impactDescription: Airstack APIs enables developers to easily create Farcaster applications and integrate Farcaster with the broader Ethereum ecosystem. For example, at ETH NYC in September 2023, 25 teams used Airstack to build apps that combined data from Farcaster, Lens, XMTP, NFTs, POAPs and more.

bio: Comprehensive weekly newsletter covering Ethereum's Layer 2 ecosystem.
contributionDescription:
The Layer 2 Weekly Roundup is a public good founded to support Ethereum's growing Layer 2 ecosystem. The Weekly Roundup is currently home to over 600 subscribers with an average of over 450 weekly readers. 

This newsletter provides readers with the most important and up to date information on all major Layer 2 protocols in addition to supporting ecosystem developers with free coverage and visibility for their applications.
impactDescription:
The Layer 2 Weekly Roundup was founded as a public good to help educate both the Ethereum and wider crypto communities about the benefits of Layer 2 scaling solutions.

The roundup has contributed to Optimism and other Layer 2 solutions by providing both users and developers with valuable information to keep them updated on everything that is happening across Ethereum's Layer 2 ecosystem. The roundup covers a variety of categories, such as protocol, ecosystem, media, and events.

bio: We creates guides, instructional videos, and technical support about staking.
contributionDescription: EthStaker's goal is to keep Ethereum decentralized. We do this by creating educational materials and by offering technical support to encourage people to run their own nodes and to stake at home. To keep Ethereum decentralized we need a diverse set of many people to run different combinations of execution and consensus clients all around the world. If too much of the Ethereum network is controlled by a small amount of people this damages Ethereum's credible neutrality and it could no longer serve effectively as the base layer for projects like Optimism.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://docs.ethstaker.cc/ethstaker-knowledge-base/","description":"A collection of useful information and concepts about Ethereum staking."},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/eth-educators/","description":"EthStaker github"}]
impactDescription: While we may not contribute directly to Optimism, we feel that without a secure and decentralized Ethereum mainnet, Optimism could not succeed in it's mission. Without Optimism Ethereum is much less useful. EthStaker's and Optimism's values, goals, and incentives are aligned.

bio: Crust provides decentralized storage and hosting solutions on top of IPFS
contributionDescription: We built a fully EVM native storage protocol and deployed our storage smart contracts and different products to the OP mainnet, From now on all OP builders and users have access to truly decentralized on-chain storage services via Crust Networks protocol and physical infrastructure. OP developers can leverage more than 600 PB of storage capacity for all their storage needs like dapp hosting, NFT storage, puplic file storage and more to achieve full scale decentralization.

Basically any kind of service, solution or dapp requires data storage in some way or the other. Unfortunately too many solutions still relay on web2 based storage services which hold security, censorship and single-point-of-failure risk. With Crust Networks tech stack devs have access to fully decentralized storage services natively within the OP ecosystem to achieve full scale decentralization for their data layer.

bio: Building Fast and reliable crypto transfers across networks.
contributionDescription:
hi 
in breef i built this smart contract on base blockchain to contribute to optimisme ecosystem by providing :
1) Automated Trading Strategies:
Developers can build automated trading strategies using this contract. For example, they can program it to perform specific trades under certain conditions or market events.
Integrations with DeFi Platforms:
This contract could be integrated into a larger decentralized finance (DeFi) platform. It could serve as a component for users to execute trades within the platform.  
2) Liquidity Provision:
The contract could be used to provide liquidity to Uniswap v3 pools. Liquidity providers can utilize the functions to efficiently manage their positions.
3) Arbitrage Opportunities 4) Customized Trading Logic 5) gas efficiency.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://basescan.org/address/0xb8f08e5a2c6f8051310cfbfb81457d21939ab3e8#code","description":" providing operations functions to interact on Uniswap v3 pools."}]
impactDescription:
The introduction of this smart contract on the Optimism network has several significant impacts on the Optimism Collective. It brings increased efficiency and cost savings, reducing transaction costs for users. This makes DeFi activities more accessible and appealing. Developers now have a powerful tool to create automated trading strategies, integrate with DeFi platforms, provide liquidity, and explore arbitrage opportunities. This expands the range of applications within the ecosystem.
The contract's ability to provide liquidity to Uniswap v3 pools enhances overall trading experiences, reducing slippage. Customizable trading logic allows for innovation in DeFi strategies, tailoring solutions to specific market conditions.

bio: Hardhat is a development environment to build and deploy your Ethereum software
contributionDescription:
We built Hardhat, one of the most widely used smart contract development environments. Hardhat allows users to compile, test, debug, deploy, and operate their Solidity smart contracts. We collaborated with the OP team in different ways to improve support for the OP community, as well as their own internal usage of the tool.

We built Hardhat for VSCode, an extension that adds advanced Solidity editing assistance to VSCode. We also repurposed the LSP backing it and built coc-solidity, which provides advanced Solidity editing assistance in Vim as well.
impactDescription:
- HH was used to build the OP protocol.
- The OP team used HH to bootstrap the platform. They built plugins so HH would work with OP, which made it the first dev tool available for OP users.
- OP team built Smock on top of HH to make contract testing easier.
- The community used HH to build projects that run on OP.
- The OP team used HH to operate the protocol.
- The OP team used HH to deploy the Optimist NFT.
- The OP team used HH to deploy the Bedrock contracts.
- Optimism SDK uses HH to operate the protocol.
- HH is used in teaching materials and guides for OP.
- The OP community uses Hardhat VSCode and vim's coc-solidity for coding in Solidity.

https://nomicfoundation.notion.site/HH-RetroPGF-3-impact-proof-links-38f52d0c59744a6d98642340c1525304

bio: Social messaging app for onchain friends with native Farcaster integration
contributionDescription:
Frens is a social messaging app for onchain friends (iOS/Android). We’ve built a private messaging app that natively supports token-gating, crypto transactions, Farcaster (auth, identity, content), and Zora network NFTs.

How onchain communities use Frens:
- The Farcaster community used Frens to organize grassroots meetups and conferences (e.g. Farcon, ETH Denver, NFT.NYC, EthCC)
- The Purple DAO community used Frens to discuss proposals
- The Orange DAO community used Frens to coordinate DAO retreats and meet ups at conferences (e.g. ETH Denver, EthCC)
- Farcaster sub-communities have formed on Frens like the FC chess club, Eventcasters, and fundraising advice
- A16z CSS 23 founders use Frens to communicate privately in founders-only groups

impactDescription:
Frens pushes the boundaries of crypto-enabled consumer user experiences:
- When a user shares a link to Farcaster, they see an interactive embed they can like and reshare — without leaving the chat
- When a user shares a link to Eventcaster, they can RSVP to the event without leaving the chat
- View NFT activity of group members within chat (supports Eth Mainnet and Zora network)
- Discover and join NFT-gated groups
- Token-gated location sharing at conferences and events

In the past 12 months:
- The Farcaster community used Frens to coordinate FarCon in Boston (Farcaster unconference), community meetups at Eth Denver, NFT NYC, and EthCC
- Orange DAO used Frens to coordinate 2 strategic IRL retreats
- Founders in the a16z CSS 23 cohort used Frens to create founder-NFT-gated group chats

bio: The Onchain Token Tracker
contributionDescription:
TKN has shipped a decentralized, onchain token tracker protocol, that anyone can suggest changes to, which serves as decentralized public infrastructure for OP tokens. 

Maintaining an online token registry allows TKN to publish a "headless" interface at swp.eth. Example: users can send eth to usdc.swp.eth and $USDC will be automatically returned.

We launched the TKN DAO on Optimism, with a unique token claim structure that doesn't require gas or trust from the user: claim.tkn.xyz/

Products shipped:
(See our full product list in glorious illustrated color: https://giveth.io/project/token-name-service)
- Token subgraph
- Developer API: docs.tkn.xyz/developers/querying-the-tns-dataset
- TokenList: https://tokenlists.org/token-list?url=list.tkn.eth
- Web app
- iOS app
- Whitepaper
- SWP.eth

bio: Portuguese-language community dedicated to the Optimism ecosystem
contributionDescription:
Although Portuguese is the fifth most spoken language worldwide, there is a dearth of materials and content about Optimism in this language. However, we are here to change that and make Optimism more accessible to Portuguese speakers.

Our initiatives encompass the translation of articles and website documentation, the creation of original articles and posts, Twitter Spaces with various communities, fostering the growth of a community for Optimism in Portuguese, and other ideas that are still in the planning phase, such as IRL/virtual events and workshops.

In the end, we just want to help Optimism grow and reach more people through education and knowledge about Optimism, OP Stack & OP Collective.

Our efforts are dedicated to long-term goals. We strongly believe that establishing a closer relationship with a web3 project in one's native language is crucial for enabling individuals to truly comprehend the Optimism Collective. Our primary goal is to continue supporting and inspiring people to delve deeper into the OP ecosystem.

We are committed to providing extensive content in Portuguese, whether through article translations, original creations, hosting Spaces with various communities and projects, fostering integration with Optimism and other Portuguese-speaking communities, and pursuing other initiatives.

Moreover, we have recently initiated a collaboration for the translation of Subli's - The Optimist, a newsletter dedicated to the Superchain.

bio: Simplifying the voting RetroPGF experience: easier to face 2 than 2000
contributionDescription:
Pairwise simplifies complex decision-making by presenting only two projects at a time for list creation. This method eases voting and introduces a system where citizens can project lists with budget allocations. Offering a solution to the RetroPGF 2 challenge of assigning percentages to 196 projects for example, Pairwise divides and reduces workload by categorizing projects and emphasizing individual expertise so that citizens can focus their vote on their areas of knowledge, ensuring both simplified and informed voting. The algorithm mirrors the Elo system used in games like League of Legends, where project comparison leads to more precise decisions.

We've crafted a completely new game experience for citizens, and we're eager for citizens to explore it.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/GeneralMagicio/pw-frontend","description":"Optimism game UI with Rainbow Kit wallet connect."},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/GeneralMagicio/pw-backend","description":"Backend for Optimism game: collations & algorithm."},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/GeneralMagicio/pw-retropgf3-categorize","description":"AI-driven API for project categorization in Optimism game."},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://pairwise.retropgf.com/","description":"Witness innovative list creation & reshaping of community decisions."}]
impactDescription: Pairwise was developed to enhance the RetroPGF decision-making process. Optimism currently has the power to use it when RetroPGF final data is made available. With streamlined choices, members can engage with projects more intuitively and suited to their knowledge, ensuring better decisions. The dynamic unlocking feature keeps the process engaging, allowing greater influence over time. Strategic allocation ensures votes align with individual visions. Beyond just vote simplification, Pairwise amplifies badgeholders' voices, championing true digital democracy. Focused on strengthening Optimism’s ecosystem, Pairwise stands as a pivotal tool, enabling badgeholders to efficiently contribute their expertise, maximizing impact with minimal time and creating a realm where every insight is valued.

bio: Never Give up. Always Run 0001
contributionDescription:
OP is the native governance token of Optimism, a Layer-2 network built to address Ethereum’s scalability challenges.
Optimism utilises a technology called optimistic rollups to bundle transactions and reduce fees on the Ethereum network.
OP token holders can participate in the governance of Optimism through the Optimism Collective.
Users can acquire OP tokens through exchanges, trading platforms, airdrops, or by participating in Optimism’s ecosystem.

bio: A self-custodial derivatives exchange built on Optimism
contributionDescription:
AMM: Provides decentralized, unified liquidity, two-sided options markets, and composable delta-hedging. It has had 2 major upgrades; Avalon, increased flexibility for LPs, more expiries, 4-5x increased capital efficiency for traders & Newport enabled cash collateral, and perp hedging for increased LP capital efficiency.

Open-Source UI: Permissionless software for accessing the Lyra Protocol 
Vault Contracts: Example that shows how a vault can execute with the protocol. The contracts, and testing/deployment tools are provided by the protocol SDK. The Vaults enable a wide range of strategies to be built with the contracts.

Protocol SDK: A quick way to import the latest deployments, contract abis, and testing tools for anyone trading algorithmically or building on top of Lyra’s liquidity.

impactDescription:
Lyra solved fundamental problems for traders in defi with unified liquidity, competitive pricing, improved gas costs, and two-sided, reliable option liquidity, offereing LPs passive, risk-adjusted yield, and improved UX by mitigating IL and risk management.

Lyra onboarded numerous developers to OP with developer tooling (Javascript SDK, Docs, Grants), and offered stable, reliable options liquidity programmatically. This led to multiple protocols integrating: Polynomial, Brahma, dSquared, dHedge, Torros, Otus Finance, Strands along with trading interfaces: Kwenta, Sharwa Finance (Dede Lend), data providers: Amber Data, Laevitas, and Aggregators: Teal Finance, stradle.xyz. Enhancing the OP Community with education, trading comps, co-marketing, onboarding incentives, and poker tournament

bio: RetroPGF Hub is the place to explore, discover, and awareness about RetroPGF.
contributionDescription:
RetroPGF Hub is the central hub for Optimists and the broader community to engage, explore, discover, and stay informed about all things related to RetroPGF. 

We are offering a platform for community members to provide supportive comments or suggestions on projects, helping creators determine their eligibility for criteria in RetroPGF3. It serves as a comprehensive learning and discovery space, encapsulating historical context, scope, criteria, nominated projects, result statistics, and reflections in each round of RetroPGF. Whether you're a builder, user, or just curious about RetroPGF, this hub is your gateway to knowledge, collaboration, and community awareness.

impactDescription:
RetroPGF Hub is your platform for discovering and exploring the world of RetroPGF. With its user-friendly interface, it brings both long-standing members and newcomers into the RetroPGF space. By amplifying community voices and governance participation, RetroPGF Hub connects users directly with the Citizens' House, creating a vibrant hub for all things RetroPGF.

This had a significant impact on the Optimism ecosystem. They provide tangible and intangible benefits to Optimists and badgeholders alike. Users can access deep project information, award results, and statistics, enabling them to make informed decisions and review projects within the current RetroPGF round. This accessibility empowers the community, fosters collaboration, and benefits all those engaged in RetroPGF.

bio: Lorak is an innovative scalable onchain game on Base, using the 6551-eip.
contributionDescription:
Lorak is live on Mainnet, since the launch of Base, and since has processed over 450k+ TXs in total. We believe that it is now one of the largest onchain games on Optimism overall. Furthermore our development acts as a blueprint for other onchain games to emerge on Optimism. 

Lorak innovates with in-game state on-chain, experimentation in asset ownership, specifically using 6551-eip in our game we've been able to implement ownership of in-game items tied to the in-game character NFT. Which allowed for an RPG type game to thrive with over 300+ NFTs to find as loot.

Behind Lorak is LandTorn is a gaming hub built on Optimisim Base, acting as a publisher and distributor of games with a focus on on-chain innovation. We are helping other onchain games build towards a future on Optimism.
impactDescription:
Lorak's impact has been felt through over 80k+ In-game character NFTs minted, over 10K unique players interfacing with our game. 410,000+ transactions processed through our contracts. Lorak, part of onchain summer on Base, is an experimental on-chain idle game built using the ERC-6551 standard, testing the limits of Token Bound accounts.

Built a new community of game enjoyers on Optimism-Base of over 3K people. 

We believe our impact is not only in the growth and showcase of a successful large scale onchain game, but also in the form of building a community of like-minded people and developers interested in onchain games. Through Landtorn we are building a whole ecosystem of onchain games on Optimism-Base and support their growth with our findings in game development & blueprints.

bio: Center serves as a platform that brings together many games for OP Collective.
contributionDescription:
Optimism Gaming Center is the gaming hub of the Optimism ecosystem. Its primary objective is to provide a fun and engaging experience to the community, while also promoting community engagement.

Games, available at this time:
- Tokens Battle - is an online game that allows players to compete with their friends and become the king of the cryptocurrency world by playing for their favorite token!
- Red Sapper - is a retro-style game that has been given an optimistic twist. It is a game straight from the 90s, but with new and improved graphics and gameplay.
- 2048 - the center also offers the classic puzzle game, 2048. This game challenges the player's logic and strategic thinking skills as they try to merge tiles to reach the highest number possible.
impactDescription: Our platform is designed for people who want to enjoy their leisure time in a safe and enjoyable way. It provides a wide variety of familiar games that are easy to play, with an optimistic design that makes the experience even more enjoyable. We do not support casino-style gambling games, but we offer a range of other options that are equally fun and engaging. Despite not having any advertising campaigns, our platform has become popular among thousands of active users who appreciate the simplicity and accessibility of our platform.

bio: Serve EIP builders, and scale Ethereum.
contributionDescription:
EIP are standards for the Ethereum ecosystem. It connects the whole Ethereum community: Ethereum, Optimism, developers, builders, startups, EIP editors/authors, tech writers, etc., but the connections through EIP are weak.

The EIP Fun project consists of a Website, Community, EIP Fun Newsletter, EIP Tech workshops, etc. to serve EIP builders and scale the whole ecosystem.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/lxdao-official/eipfun","description":"The repository of EIP Fun website, maintained by the community."},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://eipfun.substack.com/","description":"Weekly newsletter, curate information and spread EIP memes."},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://t.me/eipfun","description":"A space where discussion and connection happens."},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://twitter.com/EIPFun","description":"Where we get in touch with builders and help spread their ideas."}]
impactDescription:
As of October 17th, we have published 17 issues of the EIP Fun Weekly (English and Chinese version), providing the Ethereum community with updates, important information, and fun memes related to EIPs.

Through community-building efforts (primarily on Twitter and Telegram groups), we have connected with some EIP authors (especially new authors) to help gather feedback from the community for their ideas and created an open space for builders to connect with one another and share thoughts.

We also worked on EIP tech workshops like ERC-6551 Workshop https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1Mfo3hlTYlhu6aa-VbaOjfrn-8RJ0LQfVVzLGiYb2wz4/edit#slide=id.g2423be42a0f_0_214.

bio: in crypto since 2017, degen score holder
contributionDescription: We are reaching out to you with a request for a grant to realize our ambitious initiative — the creation of the "Optimism Degenset" platform. Our goal is to unite users within the "Optimism" network, providing them with opportunities to enhance their financial knowledge, participate in collaborative projects within the network, and improve their financial well-being by granting access to exclusive bonuses and privileges.
impactDescription:
The Purpose of the "Optimism Degenset" Project:

To bring together "Optimism" network members interested in improving their financial knowledge and investment skills.

To develop and launch the "Optimism Degenset" web platform, offering the following features:

Wallet Ratings: Users will be able to evaluate and compare their investment portfolios, receiving feedback from the community.

Collaborations: Mechanisms will be created to facilitate participation in joint investment projects and research.

Exclusive Bonuses: Users with high ratings will gain access to exclusive offers and bonuses from partners within the "Optimism" network.

NFT Ratings: Wallet ratings will be represented as unique NFTs, making them even more appealing to participants.

displayName: OP Security Council Rehearsal Beta Testers
bio: Group of beta testers with diverse levels of expertise and backgrounds
contributionDescription:
As beta testers, this group provided numerous valuable contributions to the preparation and readiness of the Optimism Security Council:

- Participated in multiple draft reviews of diverse documents, both internal and external, providing critical feedback on phrasing, procedural clarity, guidelines, and other aspects. 

- Volunteered significant time for live rehearsals of Council operations, including mock upgrade approval flows. This hands-on testing surfaced ambiguity in the drafted procedures that could be resolved prior to launch.

- Reported detailed bugs uncovered during reviews and live rehearsals. The issues spanned different areas. Identifying these bugs early was crucial.
impactDescription:
The exhaustive testing, feedback, and bug discovery provided by the Security Council beta testers delivered immense value for reducing risk and increasing preparedness as a foundational governance component was launched.

By thoroughly stressing testing the procedures and systems during the rehearsals, problematic gaps were identified that could have led to issues down the line. The group's participation enabled ambiguities and vulnerabilities to be addressed proactively before the Council went live.
fundingSources: [{"type":"OTHER","currency":"USD","amount":0,"description":"The Beta Testers were volunteering their time in good faith."}]

bio: A secured, censorship resistant Linktree alternative
contributionDescription: 1W3 has a unique functionality of tokenizing the web templates where website templates can now be tokenized as NFTs and minted directly on Optimism. This introduces a new avenue for creators to monetize their designs and fosters a deeper integration of Optimism in the world of digital assets and design.
impactDescription: Currently, we've successfully transformed four decentralized websites into customizable templates, which have been created as NFTs on the Optimism network. Enthusiastic users are actively minting these NFTs to craft their unique websites tailored for their respective ENS domains, ushering in a new era of decentralized online presence.

bio: Karma is a suite of contributor reputation tools helping DAOs improve governance
contributionDescription:
We have contributed to Optimism by building a no. of products/tools for the collective and larger web3 community on top of Optimism

1. Delegate Dashboard - We have indexed 1.5k delegates and their activity on forum and off/on chain voting system and is being updated daily. It's used to hold delegates accountable, improve visibility and help tokenholders discover candidates.

2. Onchain DAO Delegate Registry - Delegate info is scattered across different gov. frontends. To solve this, we built an onchain registry of delegates on Optimism to store all delegate info. 

3. Karma GAP (Grantee Accountability Protocol) - It's difficult for community to keep track of grantees and their progress. We built protocol on Optimism+EAS to help grantees post updates, hold them accountable and build rep.
contributionLinks: [{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://optimism.karmahq.xyz/","description":"Displays delegates and stats. Also contains delegate and delegator lookup pages."},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/show-karma/dao-delegates-app","description":"Fully customizable, whitelabel support code of the delegate app"},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://www.delegateregistry.xyz/","description":"Onchain registry of delegates across DAO ecosystem stored on Optimism."},{"type":"OTHER","url":"https://gap.karmahq.xyz/","description":"Karma GAP application to let grantees post milestone updates."},{"type":"GITHUB_REPO","url":"https://github.com/show-karma/gap-contracts","description":"Smart contracts for GAP"}]
impactDescription:
The impact of the products and tools we have built are:
 
1. Delegate dashboard: It is primarily used for looking up detailed activity metrics. No other tool aggregates activity across voting systems and forum. Delegates on Optimism forum regularly post their Karma's profile link to show their activity.

2. DAO Delegate Registry: Karma has already integrated the Delegate Registry into all our dashboards for various DAOs. Delegates across different DAOs are starting to register their information onchain.

3. Karma GAP - We soft launched GAP and grantees are starting to post milestone updates onchain.

bio: far.quest helped over 100,000 people learn about Farcaster, built on Optimism
contributionDescription:
far.quest helped over 100,000 unique people around the world learn about Farcaster, a decentralized social network built on Optimism (https://farcaster.xyz).

When our users registered on Farcaster through us, or logged in through our client at https://far.quest/cast, they interacted directly with Optimism.

We also helped developers build on Farcaster, we offered free and open-source Farcaster APIs (https://docs.wield.co/farcaster/api), and teached users how to run a Farcaster hub for half the cost of the official guides (https://docs.wield.co/farcaster/hubs).

impactDescription:
We helped over 100,000 unique people learn about Farcaster, and contributed to over 2,000 onchain Optimism transactions in 11 days once Farcaster went permissionless.

We also helped people build on Farcaster through our free open-source Farcaster APIs, and through our tutorials on how to run a Farcaster hub for half the cost of the official guides.

bio: Zonic is a "Superchain-compatible" NFT Marketplace made for optimal efficiency.
contributionDescription:
Zonic has significantly bolstered the Optimism network, becoming a frontrunner in the NFT arena. Our high-liquidity NFT marketplace serves as a central hub, simplifying exchanges for creators, traders, and artists. This eliminates the need for custom in-app NFT marketplaces, making the experience more user-friendly.

We've also championed artists, helping them display their work on Optimism, enriching the platform's diversity. This has spiked transaction volumes, energizing the ecosystem.

Beyond just a marketplace, we've introduced captivating activities on Optimism, drawing more users and enhancing its stature among NFT aficionados.

Lastly, our dedicated Discord community stands ready to assist users, ensuring a smooth NFT journey on Optimism for everyone.

impactDescription:
Zonic has enriched the Optimism ecosystem through both B2C and B2B2C approaches. While our B2C initiatives are detailed elsewhere, we also support businesses leveraging the full OP stack.

For B2B2C, we guide entities looking to integrate an NFT marketplace within their blockchain using the OP stack.

Anticipating the growth of Layer-2 networks, we understood that building a thriving ecosystem around them is challenging. Hence, Zonic introduced a "Superchain-compatible" NFT Marketplace, streamlining integration for businesses.

Recently, we've quickly integrated blockchains like Base Goerli, Base Mainnet, and Zora. Notably, Base Goerli was incorporated just an hour after its launch, highlighting our proactive approach and the value we add to the OP stack ecosystem.
